title: Trying to reconnect and then a bugsplat on Mac
body: So basically my friend has had an issue for a while now where their Mac would display "trying to reconnect" after logging in and they would have to wait for a while before it let the on. However now after trying to reconnect for around a minute or two it will report that the client has run into a bug splat and automatically close, we have tried reinstalling and everything else that is recommended on the bug splat help page (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) but none of them have worked. I would greatly appreciate any help that can be offered. The Mac is currently running on high sierra.

replies.body:
I strongly suggest dualbooting windows or linux alongside OSX, the client (even in WINE on linux) works a lot better.

It is free, easy and only needs about 35GB for windows+game or 20GB for linux.

I was always tempted to recommend that option but the Mac my friend uses is quite old so i wasn't sure whether it would be able to run it or not. Is it very intensive on the actual computer to do this.
